biotools.summary:
PolyASite is a consolidated atlas of polyadenylation sites from 3' end sequencing.

A portal to the curated set of poly(A) sites that we inferred in the human, mouse and worm genomes, based on all 3’ end sequencing datasets that we could identify in the SRA nucleotide database as of June 2019.
